post.author: reko
post.body:
Since I've been into D3, I've always seen some different HellBarons made, by Revility as a change for D3 Hellknight, D3: Hell on Earth had some but the project died.

And I've also seen this one

http://pnmedia.gamespy.com/planetdoom.gamespy.com/fms/images/textures/2/1162498561_fullres.jpg

Does anyone here knows what's about it? Where it's from , it's status, but I mostly realise by myself it's dead.

Thanks

post.author: tea monster
post.body:
I thought that DaJuice made a pretty tasty one.
If you google Baron of Hell Model there are actually quite a few out there.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
I hope I didn't mess up, there was this pretty massive spam influx and I had to manually clean it out.
Did something get removed in the process?
